name: Hillside Off Road Taxi Driver
description:
A smooth taxi drive away from the hill side and mountain, deliver the passengers in the Modern Hillside Off Road Taxi Driver and become the best transporter of the area. In the beautiful environments of mountains and snowfalls, find your passion of driving a motorized vehicle for the exchange of money. This driver job upheaves your skills as the real driver in real life. Find the passengers at the stops and take them to the destination in the driving fun simulation taxi service game of off road taxi Hillside Mountain rush.
In App Purchases:
• Unlock Levels: if you want to try every level without clearing those unlock the levels by purchasing this package in game mode then purchase this package.
Hillside Off Road Taxi Driver features:
• Multiple missions of parking and driving taxi around.
• Select from multiple vehicles and race with the time
• Environment has divided into mountains and snow parts.
• Prestige driving skills required to pass the challenges
• Best driving machine, taxi cabs have realistic graphics and compelling gameplay to keep the users
